Besides the facts that this game (historically and somewhat today) derives it's success due to the community and it's relentless efforts to keep it playable (not like there would be a company that makes millions off of it), Servers and Netcode anything if not just barely cutting it, the Skins, Cases and Community Market bordering usury and above all the horrible teammates, opponents and overall interaction experienced if not playing with four friends that aren't just fun to be around but also somewhat decent at playing the game beneath all of that terror, frustration and anger lies a gaming experience that can be one of the most satisfying and enjoyable any shooter has to offer.
